title: 43: Adding a Second Floor to Your Home
description: Laura and Larry talk about adding a second floor to a one story home. Many families like where they live, but they need more room.
itunes:subtitle: Laura and Larry talk about adding a second floor to a one story home. Many families like where they live, but they need more room.
itunes:summary: Laura and Larry talk about adding a second floor to a one story home. Many families like where they live, but they need more room. Adding a room on the first floor might not be an option. Hear what considerations must be made when adding a second floor.
itunes:author: hpd architecture + interiors
